attributes.action: Force Barcelona to sell Luis Suarez to L.F.C
attributes.additional_details:
I ask for central government to force Barcelona football club to sell Luis Suarez only to Liverpool football club and NO other Premiership Club.
Today teams named are Manchester City,Arsenal and Chelsea all on standby to move in for the signature of the former Liverpool striker.
As hypocritical managers and fans called for the most amazing hit man who terrorised defenders for 30 months in a L.F C shirt to be banned from playing are now lying in wait like blood thirsty vultures.Media hype ..Radio stations were jam packed by idiots who know want him on there side.
This also pushed  public opinion to oust the player from the club that loved him....Lfc were on the brink of greatness as the S.O.S scored goals for fun.Let us get them back together

LIVERPOOL FANS SIGN THIS PETITION
